title: Marriage to citizen of Malta

content.text: Any person who, after the appointed day, marries a person who is or becomes a citizen of Malta shall be entitled, upon making application in such manner as may be prescribed and upon taking the oath of allegiance, to be registered as a citizen of Malta.

amendmentHistory.description: Amendment to make citizenship by marriage gender-neutral

notes: This article establishes the right to citizenship through marriage to a Maltese citizen.
